document_data.name: Ala'i Kalin
document_data.mainbody: '''Ala'i Kalin''' was a member of the [[Riders of Blood]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.History: Originally from [[Huzuz]], Ala'i's father was accused as being a traitor to the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph]] and beheaded. He viewed the Grand Caliph's actions as an abuse of justice and carried deep hatred for the man ever since that day.
document_data.Activities: Ala'i used his magical abilities on raids against caravans traveling along [[Dihl al-Taif]]. He delighted in slaying as many living targets as possible, a behavior that often earned him scoldings from [[Fasim Kaldur]] who saw the value of keeping the caravan animals alive.
